title: harmful apps
extract: Google Play Protect helps you keep your device safe and secure. It runs a safety check on apps from the Google Play Store before you download them. ... These harmful apps are sometimes called malware. It warns you about any detected potentially harmful apps found, and removes known harmful apps from your device.

These harmful apps are sometimes called malware. It warns you about any detected potentially harmful apps found, and removes known harmful apps from your device.
